itemDescription: English trade unionist and Labour Party politician (1905-1990)

wikipedia_page.main: Wesley Perrins, MBE (21 September 1905 – 12 January 1990) was an English trade unionist and Labour Party politician from Stourbridge. He had a long career in local government in Worcestershire, and sat in the House of Commons from 1945 to 1950.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1945 United Kingdom general election

response: *Wesley Perrins, MBE (1905–1990), English trade unionist and Labour Party politician from Stourbridge
